definition: spoon/ladle/CL:把[ba3]/abbr. for 公勺[gong1 shao2], centiliter (unit of volume)
"dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
to be in charge of the cooking/to be the chef/head cook/chef
wok with a long handle/wok spatula/ladle
serving spoon/centiliter (i.e. 10 ml), abbr. to 勺[shao2]
one ladle (of sth bad) spoils the (whole) pot (idiom)/one bad apple spoils the barrel
pinyin: yi1 ma3 shao2 huai4 yi1 guo1

definition: (bird species of China) spoon-billed sandpiper (Eurynorhynchus pygmeus)
(bird species of China) koklass pheasant (Pucrasia macrolopha)

sentences.english: Fill the scoop lightly using the built-in leveler.
sentences.chinese: 填寫勺輕輕使用內置的勻染劑。

sentences.english: Evenly divide the mixture, approximately 2 tablespoons per cup, among the muffin cups.
sentences.chinese: 平分混合物，大約每杯2勺，放在鬆餅杯裏。

sentences.english: Supply 1 tsp chilli flake, season with salt and pepper. Stir.
sentences.chinese: 加1勺辣椒粉，適量鹽和胡椒，拌勻。

sentences.english: Little feedstuff in the drinking spoon is drunk out after several times of drinking.
sentences.chinese: 飲水勺中的少許飼料經幾次飲水即被喝淨。

sentences.english: Evenly divide the mixture approximately 2 tablespoons per cup among the muffin cups. < o<="" span="">
sentences.chinese: 平分混合物，大約每杯2勺，放在鬆餅杯裏。

sentences.english: Americans drink soup from the side of the soup spoon instead of the tip.
sentences.chinese: 美國人常用勺的邊喝湯而不用勺尖。

sentences.english: To see the pot swallow the ladle.
sentences.chinese: 看着長柄勺被吞進水罐。

sentences.english: One tablespoon to be taken at bed-time.
Shaonei plus soup thicken pour out the oil poured on the squid.
sentences.chinese: 勺內加原湯勾芡淋明油澆在烏賊上。

sentences.english: Spoon sat oil, deep-fried water chestnut fish out, the next moment Chicken gash poured.
sentences.chinese: 勺坐油，炸馬蹄撈出，下雞丁劃開片刻倒出。

sentences.english: I want to buy a wooden ladle which will not scratch an electric cooker.
sentences.chinese: 我想買個木製的飯勺，盛飯時不會劃傷電飯鍋。

sentences.english: For smaller volumes simply add 1 scoop to each 50mL of water.
sentences.chinese: 對於較少量的衝調只需添加1勺每50毫升的水。

sentences.english: old silver.-- From the ladle one could get at least two hundred francs.
sentences.chinese: 並且是古銀器，連那大勺至少可以賣二百法郎。

sentences.english: There are 10-12 teaspoons of empty calorie sugar in one can of soda.
sentences.chinese: 一聽汽水裏含有10到12勺無營養卡路里糖。

sentences.english: Sichuan children sat opposite, with bamboo spoon shook to scoop water give me wash your hands.
sentences.chinese: 川子坐在對面，用竹勺搖了勺水給我洗手。

sentences.english: The base of the spoon at the centre of the main profile is flat.
sentences.chinese: 主風翼中央的勺形區域底部現在變平了。
